entries.title: Adobe’s Renaissance Man  Scott Belsky: The C-Suite Interview
entries.description: Adobe's Scott Belsky talks about harnessing creativity to get the most of out of creative teams.

entries.title: NASA Rover Spots Strange Rock On Mars
entries.description: In a photo taken by the rover Curiosity on its 3,709th day on Mars, a strange rock spotted in the upper right of the image has NASA experts puzzled.

entries.title: Audient Reveals Its EVO SP8 Smart Mic Preamp For Musicians
entries.description: Audient’s EVO SP8 Smart Mic Preamp can bring productivity to any recording session. This latest product offers eight mic/line inputs, eight line outputs and two ADAT I/O connections.

entries.title: Europe Beefs-Up Cybersecurity Law, Trumping The UK
entries.description: The EU has introduced two new significant pieces of legislation that are intended to increase cybersecurity resilience in the European economy and the overall resilience of critical infrastructure providers to incidents that have the potential to significantly disrupt their services.

entries.title: Colombian Pop Star Shakira Proves She Is ‘Out Of Your League’ As Video Breaks YouTube Record
entries.description: It had been seen 126 million times by Monday afternoon.

entries.title: Tourists Are Loving Hawaii’s Coral Reefs To Death
entries.description: Millions of tourists visit Hawaii every year, but tragically, these tourists are damaging and destroying the coral reefs, which are at high risk of collapse

entries.title: ‘Marvel Snap’ Could Triple Its Revenue With One Easy Change
entries.description: At this point, I am practically begging Marvel Snap to allow me to throw money at it, something that it appears to be wholly disinterested in I love the game itself, its fast matches and fun decks.

entries.title: A Psychologist Suggests 3 Ways To Work Smarter, Not Harder
entries.description: Reassess and recalibrate frequently instead of bulldozing your way through your to-do list.

entries.title: Chevron Phillips Chemical Embraces Cultural Innovation
entries.description: To drive a digital transformation, Chevron Phillips Chemical had to tackle cultural issues and the fear of working with new technology.

entries.title: Netflix Has Created A Self-Fulfilling Cancelation Loop With Its New Shows
entries.description: A couple weeks ago, I remarked that Netflix now felt like it was “actively stealing time from me.” I can almost not even remember which cancelation I was talking about at the time, given that there have been so many, but I believe it was 1899

entries.title: ‘The Last Of Us’ Zombie Infection Is Real—Here’s What Scientists Say About The Threat To Humans
entries.description: The zombifying fungal infection that wiped out humanity in The Last of Us is based on a very real set of parasitic fungi that hijack insects and compel them to pass the infection on.

entries.title: It’s Become Clear What Destiny 2’s Best Content Format Is Now
entries.description: After two somewhat rocky seasons, Destiny 2 seems to have found its footing with Season of the Seraph. And the longer time goes on, the more one specific part of it seems like it’s getting praise above all else.

entries.title: Apple Confirms More Problems For iPhone 14 Pro, iPhone 14 Pro Max Buyers
entries.description: Apple confirms another iPhone 14 Pro, iPhone 14 Pro Max problem...

entries.title: COP28 Chief Outlines Climate Challenge As Countdown To ‘Global Stocktake’ Starts
entries.description: COP28 will be a significant moment because it marks the first “global stocktake”, a comprehensive assessment of progress against the goals of the Paris Agreement. This will show we are not on track to meet our climate targets.

entries.title: ‘Hogwarts Legacy’ Is Already The #1 Selling Game On Steam And PS5, #2 On Xbox
entries.description: Pre-sales for Hogwarts Legacy have been absolutely unbelievable, and it shows no sign of slowing down as we get closer to launch.

entries.title: Martin Luther King, Jr., Urged Everyone To Be ‘Maladjusted’ To Racism, APA Reminds
entries.description: In a 1967 address to the American Psychological Association, Dr. King Jr., emphasized that everyone should never become adjusted to racism, religious bigotry, economic inequities, physical violence, and other social injustices.

entries.title: HBO’s ‘The Last Of Us’ Surpasses Even Sky-High Expectations
entries.description: Even getting my hopes way, way up ahead of the premiere of The Last of Us last night, even counting the series as one of my favorites in video game history, it actually exceeded my expectations.

entries.title: Uber’s New Math: Increase Prices And Squeeze Driver Pay
entries.description: If Uber is to be given credit for fulfilling their grand promise of becoming the transformative future of urban mobility, investors, consumers, and drivers deserve to know a lot more about the real costs of being taken for a ride.

entries.title: 16 Effective Ways To Turn An SLA Strategy Into An XLA Strategy
entries.description: The goal of an XLA isn’t just to update dry contractual language to something “more appealing”; it’s also about ensuring customers receive real, ongoing value and genuinely benefit from choosing your specific services.

entries.title: Watch The Spectacular SpaceX Rocket Launch As Boosters Return To Earth In Tandem
entries.description: SpaceX successfully launched a Falcon Heavy rocket from Launch Complex 39A (LC-39A) at Kennedy Space Center in Florida on Sunday, Jan. 15, 2023.

entries.title: U.S. Healthcare: A Conglomerate Of Monopolies
entries.description: Market consolidation limits competition, choice and access to goods and services, all of which drive up prices. But there’s another—often overlooked—consequence.

entries.title: Why ‘Lost In Play’ Has The Best Video Game Credits - And Why You Should Play It With Your Children
entries.description: Lost In Play's end-credits do more than tell you who made the game.

entries.title: FTX Secretly Channeled A $50 Million Loan To Its Bahamian Bank Through An Executive’s Company
entries.description: The loan was among several deals struck with Jean Chalopin, the head of Deltec and Moonstone banks — and co-creator of Inspector Gadget — who forged a lucrative relationship with FTX.

entries.title: Adults With High Levels Of ADHD Traits At Greater Risk Of Anxiety & Depression Than Autistic Adults
entries.description: According to a new study published in the journal Scientific Reports, adults who have high levels of ADHD symptoms are at a far higher risk of experiencing mental health issues.

entries.title: Campfire Audio’s Trifecta IEMs Are Probably The Best You’ll Ever Hear
entries.description: If you're looking for a pair of earphones and money is no object, the Trifecta IEMs from Portland-based Campfire Audio are probably the warmest and most detailed you're ever likely to hear.

entries.title: Phantom Auto Tech Helping Unlikely Workers Fill Logistics Labor Shortage
entries.description: Technology making it possible to operate warehouse equipment remotely from thousands of miles away is giving people with mental and physical disabilities and those located far from the job site a shot at good paying jobs while helping to mitigate that shortage.

entries.title: The 10 Scariest Future Tech Trends Everyone Must Know About Right Now
entries.description: Is technology in the news keeping you awake at night? Should it be? Here are some of the scariest future tech trends that should be on your radar.

entries.title: HBO’s ‘The Last Of Us’ Isn’t Exactly The Same As The Game, And That’s A Good Thing
entries.description: The premiere of HBO's blockbuster show makes some notable and smart changes from Naughty Dog's game.

entries.title: Today’s Wordle #576 Hints, Clues And Answer For Monday, January 16th
entries.description: How to solve today's Wordle.

entries.title: ‘The Last Of Us’ Series Premiere Recap And Review: ‘When You’re Lost In The Darkness’
entries.description: The Last Of Us opens with a strong series premiere that sets the stage for things to come.

entries.title: Today’s ‘Heardle’ Answer And Clues For Monday, January 16
entries.description: Here's today's 'Heardle' song, along with some hints.

entries.title: Today’s ‘Quordle’ Answers And Clues For Monday, January 16
entries.description: Some hints and the solution for today's 'Quordle' are just ahead.

entries.title: The Center Of Our Galaxy May Be Way More Powerful Than We Thought, Say Scientists
entries.description: A new study indicates that scientists have substantially underestimated the energy output of supermassive black hole-powered active galactic nuclei.

entries.title: Venus Meets Saturn As Winter Stars Come Full Circle: The Night Sky This Week
entries.description: The celestial highlights for the week ahead include a beautiful conjunction between two iconic planets in the solar system.
